H0.text: Biomass is an energy source that might involve burning wood or producing gasohol.

H1.text: Wind turbine is an energy source that might involve burning wood or producing gasohol.

H2.text: Nuclear fission is the energy source that might involve burning wood or producing gasohol.

H3.text: Hydroelectric power is an energy source that might involve burning wood or producing gasohol.

A4.text: Fermentation converts biomass into bioethanol, and anaerobic digestion converts biomass into renewable natural gas (biogas).

A5.text: Wood can be used as a fuel directly or processed into pellet fuel or other forms of fuels.
